element.short: Start and end time of administration
element.definition: A specific date/time or interval of time during which the administration took place (or did not take place, when the 'notGiven' attribute is true). For many administrations, such as swallowing a tablet the use of dateTime is more appropriate.

mapping.map: RXA-3-Date/Time Start of Administration / RXA-4-Date/Time End of Administration
